channel.title: My Portfolio on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in My Portfolio on My New Hugo Site

item.title: About
item.description:
About Me

Designed by Freepik

During my Ph.D., I built pipelines to download, process, and analyze TESS data. I worked mainly in Python. I enjoyed this work, not just for my own research. I also helped other researchers with their code. I found it very satisfying to help others with their work.

In my current role, I work with researchers on their programming needs. This also helps me prepare for a future in industry.

item.title: Interactive Data Visualization Dashboard
item.description: Built an interactive dashboard for real-time data visualization using Python.

item.title: Light Curve Analysis Tool
item.description: Tools to merge and analyze multi-sector photometric data from space missions. The tools handle large datasets and identify periodic signals.

item.title: Publications
item.description:
Publications

My research has resulted in several publications in peer-reviewed journals. These papers cover topics in astronomy, planetary science, and observational techniques.

item.title: TESS Data Pipeline
item.description: I built pipelines to download, process, and analyze TESS data. The pipeline includes automated quality control, error correction, and period analysis.
